body:
Martin,

Every laptop I've had said to not leave the computer plugged in 24/7.  Better to buy the best battery up front.  In 2-4 years, you will not want to shell out $150 on a new battery for an old computer.  Ice packs?  Only if you decide to overdrive your processor!

Mark
